summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4638 for the improvement of 18th Avenue Northeast, from East 70th Street to East 73rd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53940, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
